rows.name:
I should probably clean this area up
soon...

This place used to be
a bustling market, you know.

It's rare to get customers from abroad...
Apologies, the bar is still being prepared.

Welcome!
The bar is now open for business.
I saw a Luckroach over there!

Oh, that's a lucky insect!
Something good is sure to happen.

Relaxing in the shade with a good book...
This is the life...
I wish I could go outside one day!

Ahh...
That's pricey...
Playing outside is more fun, mo!

No way!
Reading books is more fun!

This is Luxuria's prestigious
Philosofia Great Library.

...and that's the story.
That's the history of Luxuria in a nutshell.
I never knew!

Wow!
That's cool!
Tell us another one!

Muuummyyy!
I'm huuuungryyyy!
I want fiiiish!

Look, just drop the price by another
100G and you've got a deal.
Come on, please?
Is that book any good?

*sigh*
I can't afford any nice clothes...

Heheh, hey!
Let's scribble something on this wall!
Don't forget to write your name, mo!

Hey, check it out. I'm going to
snowball that spaced-out guy...
It's cold outside. Please, do come in.

No one's going to attack us here!
I'm so bored of these daily patrols...
Stow it! You're on duty.

I'd like to get a Nopon's opinion
on my business plan.

Let's have a drink!
Cheers!
I'm short on cash again...
Snowball fight, mo!

I've got things you won't find at
the daytime stalls!

To be fair, that stall is a bit cheaper
than the daytime ones...
Still plenty expensive, though.

I heard there's a Blade sealed
away somewhere in Theosoir...

Damn it...
I pulled another all-nighter...
Oh, I'm starving!
*sigh*...
I wish I could live a little more lavishly...

Anyone who makes a ruckus gets
dragged to the palace.

Discussing politics all night long...
This is a true pleasure.
Check it thoroughly!
